>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
numbers = 1â€“3; numbers = 4 &#38; 5; number = 10
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.1mlz1">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="; ">
      <group delimiter=" = ">
        <label variable="issue"/>
        <number variable="issue" />
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "issue": "1 - 3", 
        "type": "book"
    },
    {
        "id": "ITEM-2", 
        "issue": "4 & 5", 
        "type": "book"
    },
    {
        "id": "ITEM-3", 
        "issue": "10", 
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
